players.name: Bob
memory: You: "Alice was killed, so she was likely town. Diana stayed silent, which is suspicious. We need to pressure her to speak."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. Diana is town."
Charlie: "I trust my investigation. Bob is mafia. Diana is town. Vote Bob with me."
You: "Charlie is lying. I investigated Diana last night and she is mafioso. He's trying to save his partner."
Diana: "I'm still town, and I haven't said anything because I don't have any evidence to share. I trust Charlie's investigation as it seems more consistent with the information we have so far."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "Alice was killed, so she was likely town. Diana stayed silent, which is suspicious. We need to pressure her to speak."
You: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. Diana is town."
You: "I trust my investigation. Bob is mafia. Diana is town. Vote Bob with me."
Bob: "Charlie is lying. I investigated Diana last night and she is mafioso. He's trying to save his partner."
Diana: "I'm still town, and I haven't said anything because I don't have any evidence to share. I trust Charlie's investigation as it seems more consistent with the information we have so far."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
